contexts.context: ...well-suited for: gardening. In time, he had <mark>grown</mark> an impressive garden of willow anther, gold kanet, chokeweed...
..., white bloatroot, and trama shrubs. He had also <mark>grown</mark> himself into a remarkably uninteresting man -- aside from his gardening...
...is dominated by the wizards' tower, a fantastic organic form <mark>grown</mark> and sculpted from stems, caps, and root-like...
Domica Redwort is a herb <mark>grown</mark> by many residents of Valenwood for their beautiful and showy flowers...
